'''0.97''' is a minor update to ''[[MinecraftEdu]]'', which changed the appareance of the [[logo]], and adds an EDU [[splash]]. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.0.0]].

== Changes ==
'''Title screen'''
* Changed logo from [[File:MinecraftEdu logo 1.png|width=133x133]] to [[File:MinecraftEdu logo 3.png|width=133x133]].
